pages.title: Chlorine
pages.text: Chlorine can be used to clean bloody water in a cauldron returning it to water. Chlorine is created by have an electrical current run through a basin full of brine solution, to do this fill a brine basin full of brine solution and leave outside during a thunderstorm. Eventually it will be struck by lightning converting it to chlorine.

pages.title: Brine Solution
pages.text: To craft the brine solution you will need 2 items, salt and a water bucket. Hold the bucket in one hand and the salt in another. (It doesn't matter which way round you have the items) Then simply right click. 1 salt will be consumed and the bucket of water will convert into a brine solution.
